pages.text: Something old, something... §lnew.§r$(br2)A copy of Hexhaven's spawn, shaped and molded by Blessbane in its own image. What was beautiful prose is now twisted, malformed snippets of half-thoughts-- what once was lush greenery is now dull, and petrified.$(br2)The mayor is close. Follow his frog-prints, there might be a clue!

pages.title: Center of the Labyrinth
pages.text: $(o)This is... wrong. Why is it so similar? Could that be the key...?$()
